Welcome to the MOSAiC resource portal.

This repository now serves two complementary purposes:

1. An interactive JBrowse instance (launch it via the JBrowse link in the navbar).
2. A Quarto website (this site) documenting available genome feature / annotation tab-delimited files for download and reuse.

## JBrowse

Open the genome browser directly: [Open JBrowse](../index.html){target="_blank"}.

Embedded view below:

<iframe src="../index.html" style="width:100%;height:700px;border:1px solid #ccc;border-radius:4px;" title="JBrowse"></iframe>

## Data Files

See the [Data Files](data.qmd) page for an automatically generated listing of resources placed in the `data/` directory.

## Contributing Data

Place additional tab-delimited files (e.g. BED, GFF3, TSV, CSV) into the top-level `data/` directory. Re-render this site (instructions in the root `README.md`) to update the listing.

## Build

You need the Quarto CLI installed locally.

```
quarto --version
quarto render quarto/
```

Preview with live reload:

```
quarto preview quarto/
```

## Future Ideas
